verses.verse: "And now, <S%H6258><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am teaching <S%H3925><s%> you to perform, <S%H6213><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> in and take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers, is giving <S%H1><s%> you.

"You shall not add <S%H3254><s%> to the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am commanding <S%H6680><s%> you, nor <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H1639><s%> away <S%H1639><s%> from it, that you may keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you.

"Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> in the case of Baal-peor, for all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> followed <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> Baal-peor, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from among <S%H7130><s%> you.
"But you who held <S%H1695><s%> fast <S%H1695><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> are alive <S%H2416><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3605><s%> of you.

"See, <S%H7200><s%> I have taught <S%H3925><s%> you statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me, that you should do <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are entering <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

"So keep <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> [them], for that is your wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and your understanding <S%H998><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> 'Surely <S%H7534><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is a wise <S%H2450><s%> and understanding <S%H995><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>'

"For what <S%H4310><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is there that has a god <S%H430><s%> so near <S%H7138><s%> to it as is the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> whenever <S%H3605><s%> we call <S%H7121><s%> on Him?

"Or what <S%H4310><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is there that has statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> as righteous <S%H6662><s%> as this <S%H2088><s%> whole <S%H3605><s%> law <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am setting <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%>?

"Only <S%H7534><s%> give <S%H8104><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourself and keep <S%H8104><s%> your soul <S%H5315><s%> diligently, <S%H3966><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> you forget <S%H7911><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen, <S%H7200><s%> and lest <S%H6435><s%> they depart <S%H5493><s%> from your heart <S%H3824><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life; <S%H9132><s%> but make <S%H3045><s%> them known <S%H3045><s%> to your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your grandsons. <S%H1121><s%>

"[Remember] the day <S%H3117><s%> you stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> at Horeb, <S%H2722><s%> when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Assemble <S%H6950><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to Me, that I may let them hear <S%H8085><s%> My words <S%H1697><s%> so <S%H834><s%> they may learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Me all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> they live <S%H2416><s%> on the earth, <S%H127><s%> and that they may teach <S%H3925><s%> their children. <S%H1121><s%>'

"And you came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the foot <S%H8478><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> to the [very] heart <S%H3820><s%> of the heavens: <S%H8064><s%> darkness, <S%H2822><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> and thick <S%H6205><s%> gloom. <S%H6205><s%>

"Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire; <S%H784><s%> you heard <S%H8085><s%> the sound <S%H6963><s%> of words, <S%H1697><s%> but you saw <S%H7200><s%> no <S%H369><s%> form <S%H8544><s%> â€“ only <S%H2108><s%> a voice. <S%H6963><s%>

"So He declared <S%H5046><s%> to you His covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to perform, <S%H6213><s%> [that is,] the Ten <S%H6235><s%> Commandments; <S%H1697><s%> and He wrote <S%H3789><s%> them on two <S%H8147><s%> tablets <S%H3871><s%> of stone. <S%H68><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> me at that time <S%H6256><s%> to teach <S%H3925><s%> you statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments, <S%H4941><s%> that you might perform <S%H6213><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are going <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

"So watch <S%H8104><s%> yourselves <S%H5315><s%> carefully, <S%H3966><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> you did not see <S%H7200><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> form <S%H8544><s%> on the day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you at Horeb <S%H2722><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%>

lest <S%H6435><s%> you act <S%H7843><s%> corruptly <S%H7843><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> a graven <S%H6459><s%> image <S%H6459><s%> for yourselves in the form <S%H8544><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> figure, <S%H5566><s%> the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of male <S%H2145><s%> or <S%H176><s%> female, <S%H5347><s%>

the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> animal <S%H929><s%> that is on the earth, <S%H776><s%> the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> winged <S%H3671><s%> bird <S%H6833><s%> that flies <S%H5774><s%> in the sky, <S%H8064><s%>

the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of anything <S%H3605><s%> that creeps <S%H7430><s%> on the ground, <S%H127><s%> the likeness <S%H8403><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> fish <S%H1710><s%> that is in the water <S%H4325><s%> below <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"And [beware,] lest <S%H6435><s%> you lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the stars, <S%H3556><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and be drawn <S%H5080><s%> away <S%H5080><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> them and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, those which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has allotted <S%H2505><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

"But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has taken <S%H3947><s%> you and brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the iron <S%H1270><s%> furnace, <S%H3564><s%> from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to be a people <S%H5971><s%> for His own possession, <S%H5159><s%> as today. <S%H3117><s%>

"Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with me on your account, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> that I should not cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and that I should not enter <S%H935><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you as an inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

"For I shall die <S%H4191><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> I shall not cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> but you shall cross <S%H5674><s%> and take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>

"So watch <S%H8104><s%> yourselves, lest <S%H6435><s%> you forget <S%H7911><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He made <S%H3772><s%> with you, and make <S%H6213><s%> for yourselves a graven <S%H6459><s%> image <S%H6459><s%> in the form <S%H8544><s%> of anything <S%H3605><s%> [against] which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.
"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is a consuming <S%H398><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God. <S%H410><s%>

"When <S%H3588><s%> you become <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of children <S%H1121><s%> and children <S%H1121><s%>'s children and have remained <S%H3462><s%> long <S%H3462><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and act <S%H7843><s%> corruptly, <S%H7843><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> an idol <S%H6459><s%> in the form <S%H8544><s%> of anything, <S%H3605><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which <S%H7451><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> [so as] to provoke <S%H3707><s%> Him to anger, <S%H3707><s%>

I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against you today, <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely perish quickly <S%H6><s%> from the land <S%H6><s%> where <S%H4118><s%> <S%H776><s%> you are going <S%H834><s%> over <S%H8033><s%> the Jordan <S%H5674><s%> to possess <S%H5674><s%> it. You shall not live <S%H3383><s%> long <S%H3423><s%> <S%H748><s%> on it, but shall be utterly <S%H748><s%> destroyed. <S%H3117><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> and you shall be left <S%H7604><s%> few <S%H4962><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall drive <S%H5090><s%> you.

"And there <S%H8033><s%> you will serve <S%H5647><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of man's hands, <S%H3027><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone, <S%H68><s%> which <S%H834><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> smell. <S%H9552><s%>

"But from there <S%H8033><s%> you will seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and you will find <S%H4672><s%> [Him] if <S%H3588><s%> you search <S%H1875><s%> for Him with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>

"When you are in distress <S%H9496><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> have come <S%H4672><s%> upon you, in the latter <S%H319><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> you will return <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and listen <S%H8085><s%> to His voice. <S%H6963><s%>

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is a compassionate <S%H7349><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> He will not fail <S%H7503><s%> you nor <S%H3808><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> you nor <S%H3808><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> with your fathers which <S%H1><s%> He swore <S%H834><s%> to them.

"Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> concerning the former <S%H7223><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were before <S%H6440><s%> you, since <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and [inquire] from one end <S%H7097><s%> of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> to the other. <S%H7097><s%> <S%H8064><s%> Has [anything] been <S%H1961><s%> done <S%H1961><s%> like this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> or <S%H176><s%> has [anything] been heard <S%H8085><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> it?

"Has [any] people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> as you have heard <S%H8085><s%> [it], and survived <S%H2421><s%>?

"Or <S%H176><s%> has a god <S%H430><s%> tried <S%H5254><s%> to go <S%H935><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> for himself a nation <S%H1471><s%> from within <S%H7130><s%> [another] nation <S%H1471><s%> by trials, <S%H4531><s%> by signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> and by war <S%H4421><s%> and by a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> and by great <S%H1419><s%> terrors, <S%H4172><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%>?

"To you it was shown <S%H7200><s%> that you might know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> He is God; <S%H430><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> other <S%H5750><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> Him.

"Out of the heavens <S%H8064><s%> He let you hear <S%H8085><s%> His voice <S%H6963><s%> to discipline <S%H3256><s%> you; and on earth <S%H776><s%> He let you see <S%H7200><s%> His great <S%H1419><s%> fire, <S%H784><s%> and you heard <S%H8085><s%> His words <S%H1697><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire. <S%H784><s%>

"Because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H3588><s%> He loved <S%H157><s%> your fathers, therefore He chose <S%H1><s%> their descendants <S%H977><s%> after <S%H2233><s%> them. And He personally <S%H310><s%> brought <S%H6440><s%> you from Egypt <S%H3318><s%> by His great <S%H4714><s%> power, <S%H1419><s%>

driving <S%H3423><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> you nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> you, to bring <S%H935><s%> you in [and] to give <S%H5414><s%> you their land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> as it is today. <S%H3117><s%>

"Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore today, <S%H3117><s%> and take <S%H7725><s%> it to your heart, <S%H3824><s%> that the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> He is God <S%H430><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> and on the earth <S%H776><s%> below <S%H4480><s%>; <S%H8478><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> other. <S%H5750><s%>

"So you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> His statutes <S%H2706><s%> and His commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am giving <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> that it may go <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> with you and with your children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you, and that you may live <S%H748><s%> long <S%H748><s%> <S%H3117><s%> on the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> you for all <S%H3605><s%> time. <S%H3117><s%>"

Then <S%H227><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> set <S%H914><s%> apart <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> across <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to the east, <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%>

that a manslayer <S%H7523><s%> might flee <S%H5127><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> who <S%H834><s%> unintentionally <S%H1847><s%> <S%H1097><s%> slew <S%H7523><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> having enmity <S%H8130><s%> toward him in time <S%H8032><s%> past; <S%H8543><s%> and by fleeing <S%H5127><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> he might live: <S%H2421><s%>

Bezer <S%H1221><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> on the plateau <S%H776><s%> <S%H4334><s%> for the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and Ramoth <S%H7216><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%> for the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and Golan <S%H1474><s%> in Bashan <S%H1316><s%> for the Manassites. <S%H4520><s%>
Now this <S%H2088><s%> is the law <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>
